knowledge and experience on GCP and Cloud technologies will be added value.

Support Large Teradata data warehouse databases.
Support Infrastructure and application DevOps teams with changes and releases.
Experience with DevOps tools such as GITHub, Confluence, and Jira
Participate in all technical tasks defined for the team as and when appropriate, ensure completion
Be aware of the ongoing infrastructure issues and vigilant to avoid / minimize downtime of services
Understand business, environments, shared services to prioritize incidents

Follow escalation procedures where required and follow best practices
Interact with application teams and other infrastructure teams to make sure the requirements are addressed in time.

Expertise in Teradata Administration and Data warehouse design and concepts.

Strong experience in Teradata DSA / Backup and restore strategies.
Working experience on Data Mover. Experience in setting up data mover jobs as per application requirement.
Experience on working with Net backup.
Hands on Experience on Teradata Tools and Utilities.
Strong knowledge of SQL and able to advise on performance recommendations for SQL.
Expertise in administering Teradata Viewpoint portlets and configuring alerts.
Knowledge on DR activities planning and implementation.
Knowledge and Experience with Unity Preferred.
Process knowledge about Incident / Change / problem management tools and procedures.
Basic knowledge of Shell scripting or Python scripting.
Should be flexible to work in shifts and should be part of on-call support rota.
Experience running and supporting large Data warehouses with minimal downtime.
Setup automation(s) to take out waste
Willing to learn other database technologies like Oracle / MSSQL / PostgreSQL / MongoDB as part of Wider DBA Infrastructure team.
Experience on Teradata Vantage or Knowledge on cloud technologies, especially Google cloud is a plus.

Amazon carries the world’s largest catalog of products. Selection is key to the flywheel and ensures our customers can always find something that will delight them.
